definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: show-piece, figure, imagination;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Le 26:1, sf. [[מַשְׂכִּיתוֹ]] Ez Eze 8:12, [[מַשְׂכִּתוֹ]] Pr 18:11; pl. cstr. [[מַשְׂכִיּוֹת]] Pr 25:11, Ps 73:7, sf. [[מַשְׂכִּיּׁתָם]] Nu 33:52;—

show-piece, specif. carved figure, of idolatrous symbols, Nu 33:52 (P; ‖[[מַסֵּכׂתָם חַלְמֵי ]]), ´[[אֶבֶן מ]]: Le 26:1 (‖[[מַצֵּבָה ]] etc.), ´[[חַדְרֵי מ]]: Ez Eze 8:12 ( >del. Co); elsewhere [[כֶּסֶף]] ´[[מ]]: Pr 25:11 silver carvings.
